creator: MCN Group
descriptionHtml:
Did you know drug prices can be very different from pharmacy to pharmacy? We’ve taken the guess-work out of finding the best prescription price using our instant price finder app.

By using our app you’ll see current cash and sale prices so you get the very best prices on thousands of prescriptions from pharmacies in your location. We’ll even let you know which pharmacies have generic drugs for less than $4 per fill, and even when certain drugs are $0!

And unlike other apps, we’re super-easy to use.

Just show your phone to your pharmacist and save an average of 54% up to 81% on your prescriptions.

No need to print, no need to call in to get special permission – just show, save and go!

And unlike other apps there are never any fees or obligations. America’s Pharmacy is 100% free to use. Every member of your family can use our app. It even works on prescriptions for your pets.

By downloading the America’s Pharmacy app, you agree to be bound by our Terms of Use. Read more at http://www.americaspharmacy.com/terms

Start saving now with America’s Pharmacy!

title: America's Pharmacy

creator: MCN Group
descriptionHtml:
With the America’s Pharmacy app, save up to 80% on your prescriptions at thousands of pharmacies across the U.S.!

Did you know that your Rx prices can be very different from one pharmacy to the next? America’s Pharmacy has removed the guesswork from finding the best drug prices with our free to use prescription discount app.

By using our app you’ll see current cash and sale prices so you can find discounts on thousands of prescriptions from pharmacies near you. We’ll even let you know which pharmacies have generic drugs for less than $4 per fill, and when certain drugs are $0!

Just show your prescription drug coupon from within the app to your pharmacist and receive discounts on your medications. No need to print out coupons, no need to call in to get special permission. The America’s Pharmacy app is simple to use:

• Step One: Download the app and get your free Rx discount card right on your phone.
• Step Two: Search for your medication and compare prices in your area.
• Step Three: To use your coupon or card, just present your phone at the nearest participating pharmacy.
• Step Four: Save up to 80% on prescription costs.

And unlike other Rx discount apps, there are never any fees or obligations. America’s Pharmacy is 100% free to use. Every member of your family can use our app. It even works on prescriptions for your pets.

Start saving on your medications today with prescription drug discounts from America’s Pharmacy!

By downloading the America’s Pharmacy app, you agree to our Terms of Use. The contents of this app are for informational purposes only. DISCOUNT ONLY - NOT INSURANCE. The range of the discounts will vary depending upon the type of provider and services rendered. Read more at: https://www.americaspharmacy.com/terms
descriptionShort: Save on medications with prescription drug discounts from America’s Pharmacy!

title: Rx Discount App - America’s Pharmacy

creator: The MCN Group LLC
descriptionHtml:
Did you know drug prices are very different from pharmacy to pharmacy?

And that you can save up to 80% on your prescriptions every day -- Free?

Get free instant-savings coupons from America's Pharmacy, the app honored by pharmacists!

By using our app, you’ll see the lowest prices on tens-of-thousands of prescriptions at YOUR participating pharmacy (at some participating pharmacies you’ll be able to purchase $4 generics, and some drugs at $0!).

America's Pharmacy is easy-to-use:
◆ Find Your Prescription
◆ Select YOUR participating pharmacy
◆ No registration required
◆ Get your free coupon

Get Your Discounts - Free!
◆ Honored by pharmacists
◆ Recommended by doctors
◆ Save up to 80% on YOUR prescription at YOUR participating Pharmacy
◆ Coupons are free

Get Your Discounts - Fast!
◆ unlike other apps, we’re super quick and simple
◆ no registration required
◆ Just show to your pharmacist & save up to 80% instantly!


No need to print anything, just show & save!

America’s Pharmacy is 100% free to use. Every member of your family can use our app. You can even use our app for discounts on prescriptions for your pets!

Here's what America's Pharmacy users are saying about our program.

- "This was more money than I saved with other cards. It might not be a lot to other people but saving an extra $83.20 per month makes a difference in a life like mine."

- "My $1,400.00 dollar prescription was only $40.00 with coupon from Americas Pharmacy. Thank you very much. If I hadn't found this I would be doing without, very grateful. It's just unbelievable that there could be such difference."

- "I can testify to this! I used them for my son’s prescription yesterday! It took it from $42 to $12.50... Thank you America's Pharmacy!!"

- "Phenomenal discounts — so many great low prices can't beat it seriously. I love you guys."

By downloading the America’s Pharmacy app, you agree to be bound by our Terms of Use https://www.americaspharmacy.com/terms

Start saving now with America’s Pharmacy!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
First and foremost, we're always adding new drug discounts. And lowering prices!

But while we were working on that, we've also added new ways to save. You can use home delivery for prescriptions to save even more. We also added savings on diabetic supplies, like meters and test strips.

So when you want to save money on your prescription medication and diabetic supplies, check us first!

And since we're not perfect, please send bugs, comments, and general questions to info@americaspharmacy.com.

title: America’s Pharmacy

creator: The MCN Group LLC
descriptionHtml:
Did you know drug prices are very different from pharmacy to pharmacy?

And that you can save up to 80% on your prescriptions every day -- Free?

Get free instant-savings coupons from America's Pharmacy, the app honored by pharmacists!

By using our app, you’ll see the lowest prices on tens-of-thousands of prescriptions at YOUR participating pharmacy (at some participating pharmacies you’ll be able to purchase $4 generics, and some drugs at $0!).

America's Pharmacy is easy-to-use:
    ◆ Find Your Prescription
    ◆ Select YOUR participating pharmacy
    ◆ No registration required
    ◆ Get your free coupon

Get Your Discounts - Free!
    ◆ Honored by pharmacists
    ◆ Recommended by doctors
    ◆ Save up to 80% on YOUR prescription at YOUR participating Pharmacy
    ◆ Coupons are free

Get Your Discounts - Fast!
    ◆ unlike other apps, we’re super quick and simple
    ◆ no registration required
    ◆ Just show to your pharmacist & save up to 80% instantly!

No need to print anything, just show & save!

America’s Pharmacy is 100% free to use. Every member of your family can use our app. You can even use our app for discounts on prescriptions for your pets!

Here's what America's Pharmacy users are saying about our program.

- "This was more money than I saved with other cards. It might not be a lot to other people but saving an extra $83.20 per month makes a difference in a life like mine."

- "My $1,400.00 dollar prescription was only $40.00 with coupon from Americas Pharmacy. Thank you very much. If I hadn't found this I would be doing without, very grateful. It's just unbelievable that there could be such difference."

- "I can testify to this! I used them for my son’s prescription yesterday! It took it from $42 to $12.50... Thank you America's Pharmacy!!"

- "Phenomenal discounts — so many great low prices can't beat it seriously. I love you guys."

By downloading the America’s Pharmacy app, you agree to be bound by our Terms of Use https://www.americaspharmacy.com/terms

Start saving now with America’s Pharmacy!

title: America’s Pharmacy

creator: The MCN Group LLC
descriptionHtml:
Fact #1: you can save up to 80% on your prescriptions. Every day. And did you know using the program is free?

Fact #2: Did you know drug prices can vary drastically from pharmacy to pharmacy?

Now that you know, get the instant-savings app from America's Pharmacy, the coupons that are honored by pharmacists nationwide!

When you use the America’s Pharmacy app, you’ll find low prices on tens-of-thousands of drugs at YOUR OWN local participating pharmacy including when participating pharmacy offers $4 (or even $0!) prices on certain generics.

Get America’s Pharmacy Discounts - Free!
◆ America’s Pharmacy is honored by pharmacists
◆ America’s Pharmacy is recommended by doctors
◆ You can save up to 80% on YOUR prescription at YOUR local participating pharmacy
◆ Every America’s Pharmacy coupon is free

Get America’s Pharmacy Discounts - Fast!
◆ unlike other apps, we’re simple, easy, and quick
◆ You don’t register!
◆ Just show the app to your pharmacist to save up to 80% instantly!

Why? Because America's Pharmacy is so easy:
◆ You can find Your Prescription
◆ You can select YOUR participating pharmacy
◆ There is no registration required
◆ You get free coupons within seconds of opening the app

No printer needed!
You never need to print anything, just show & save!

America’s Pharmacy is 100% free to use. And every member of your family can use our app – there are even discounts for pet medications (these coupons are free to use too!).

America's Pharmacy users say great things about our program.

“This was more money than I saved with other cards. It might not be a lot to other people but saving an extra $83.20 per month makes a difference in a life like mine.”

“My $1,400.00 dollar prescription was only $40.00 with coupon from Americas Pharmacy. Thank you very much. If I hadn't found this I would be doing without, very grateful. It's just unbelievable that there could be such difference.”

“I can testify to this! I used them for my son’s prescription yesterday! It took it from $42 to $12.50... Thank you America's Pharmacy!!””

“Phenomenal discounts — so many great low prices can't beat it seriously. I love you guys.”

When you download the America’s Pharmacy app you agree to be bound by our Terms of Use https://www.americaspharmacy.com/terms, Privacy Policy https://www.americaspharmacy.com/privacy, and Member Agreement https://www.americaspharmacy.com/member_agreement.

Don’t wait! Save now with the America’s Pharmacy app!
